item.title: CLRS Question
item.description: This weekend I have been working on the CSC263 assignment. There was one question regarding augmenting data structure that was on the CLRS I found interesting: Consider n chords on a circle, each defined by its endpoints. Describe an O(nlgn) time algorithm to determine the number of pairs of chords that intersect inside the circle. (For example, if the n chords are all diameters that meet at the center, then the correct answer is nC2).
